data.name: ePic Character Generator - Season #3: Female Rider
data.detailed_description:
Send your characters to battle, but make sure to mount them up first! Choose from horses, snakes, dinos, and many other creatures to ride!
The output resolution of this pack is 1010 x 1200 pixels.
External artwork by Ivanina Elena @art_zdesiseitsas.

Available categories:
- 24 mounts
- 176 mount items
- 2 boots
- 81 items and weapons in varying hand positions
- 8 bracelets
- 15 colorable hair
- 15 hair preset
- 7 dress
- 4 ear
- 9 eye
- 5 lips
- 4 eyebrow
- 4 eyelash
- 26 head items
- 11 horns
- 8 necklace  
- 3 paint
- 5 pants
- 3 scarf
- 9 skirt
- 9 panties  
- 10 top
- 9 underwear
- 8 waist item

- 17 background
- 23 effects
- 8 floor
- 3 placable items

data.short_description: Send your characters to battle, but make sure to mount them up first! Choose from horses, snakes, dinos, and many other creatures to ride!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1370 x 770 pixels
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel i3 @ 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2560 x 1440 pixels or higher desktop resolution
